title: Kayle's ult
body: it's so clunky, i have to click it 5+ times sometimes to make it work, and in MANY important situations it's 100% unresponsive, please QOL fix this

replies.body: really?? i never seen that she the 1st champ i got with IP
I have noticed this as well, it has very inaccurate and unforgiving targeting.
